Books.BookTitle: Invisible Women: Data Bias in a World Designed for Men
Books.BookSynopsis: A landmark, prize-winning, international bestselling examination of how a gender gap in data perpetuates bias and disadvantages women, now in paperback

Books.BookTitle: The Potentialist I: Your Future in the New Reality of the Next Thirty Years
Books.BookSynopsis: Those of you living through the next thirty years will become the most powerful humans that have ever existed. You will live long, new lifestyles doing notable, important work. You will live as only geniuses could have done in the past. You will collaborate and share experiences in physical and virtual reality with anyone around the world at any time. Innovations in medicine, automation, and unlimited computing storage and power make it possible.

In Thunderstruck, Erik Larson tells the interwoven stories of two men—Hawley Crippen, a very unlikely murderer, and Guglielmo Marconi, the obsessive creator of a seemingly supernatural means of communication—whose lives intersect during one of the greatest criminal chases of all time.
